author: Staff Reporter
text:
Puducherry police on Monday booked a case under Prevention of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO) Act against a butcher from D Nagar, Nellithope, for sexually abusing a 17-year old girl.

The girl, now a mother to six month old child, along with her mother had approached the Child Welfare Committee (CWC) to file case against the butcher Babu for cheating her.

“She was married to one Aiyappan of Muthirapalayam when she was 15 years old. Fed up with the abusive marriage, she left him and stayed with her mother in Kuyavarapalayam,” said, Vidya Ramkumar, chairperson, CWC.

Here she met Babu and fell in love with him.

“He took her to his place in Murungapakkam where his mother was ill, promising marriage. After his mother recovered, he asked her to leave despite disclosing that she was pregnant with his child. He refused to marry her even after she gave birth to the child. Frustrated, she filed a complaint at the all women police station,” said Ms. Ramkumar.
title: Case against butcher under POCSO Act
